name: Ragemod
body:
### RageMod for Bukkit

RageMod is a Bukkit plugin, designed to turn Minecraft into something new on all servers that use it, it implements:

NPCs (with the Citizens API).
NPC Towns (ran by players, populated by NPCs).
Player Towns (ran and populated by players).
Quests (an extensive questing system, quests can be reserved, and some repeated).
A capitol city (with a huge lot system, economy done by Vault).
Permissions for almost everything (requires Vault).
Other Misc. Features (e.g compass commands and temporary building permits for the capitol).

### Developers

## Current:

@PandazNWafflez
@Perdemot
@JorgenG

## Old:

Pandemoneus

### Want to help develop RageMod?

Get in touch with @PandazNWafflez or @Perdemot or @TheIcarusKid to help with development, or just fork the project and make pull requests.

### Support or Contact

Contact @PandazNWafflez or @Perdemot for support.
tagline: We're recovering from the code rape, kinda.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
